docopt_util module¶

This module is for holding all the class objects which used to create the tokens for each type of keywords in the usage pattern and options table in the docstrings

class docopt_util.Argument(text, prev=None, post=None, children=None)¶

Bases: docopt_util.Leaf

Placeholder

get_res_dict(is_match)¶
Parameters

is_match – boolean for if input is matching the pattern

Returns

return the dictionary is success

match(args, index)¶
Parameters

  • args – the list of tokens for comparison

  • index – the index of token that will be compared

Returns

return true, the next index of token list, and the dictionary if success

class docopt_util.Branch(tokens=None, prev=None, post=None, children=None)¶

Bases: docopt_util.Token

Branch class

flat(*types)¶
Parameters

types – the class type of current keyword

Returns

class docopt_util.Command(text, value=False, prev=None, post=None, children=None)¶

Bases: docopt_util.Leaf

Placeholder

get_res_dict(is_match)¶
Parameters

is_match – boolean value for checking if the token is matching argument

Returns

return the dictionary according to the boolean

match(args, index)¶
Parameters

  • args – the list of incoming argument that will be used to compare

  • index – the index of element that needed to compare

Returns

return true and the new index skipping to and the dictionary for current keyword

docopt_util.is_num(arg)¶
Args:

arg: input object that going to check if it is a number.

Returns:

true is input is number, else return false.
